verbs.description: A [V: sit] - down [ARG0: between President Donald] [ARG2: Trump and French President Emmanuel Macron] followed by a joint news conference highlight the business portion of the French leader 's second day in Washington .

[ARG2: A sit - down between President Donald Trump and French President Emmanuel Macron] [V: followed] [ARG1: by a joint news conference] highlight the business portion of the French leader 's second day in Washington .
